imdb.title: Dejimon Adobenchâ
imdb.plot: An animated series based on the popular children's toy "Digimon", in which kids raise and train electronic monsters to fight against those raised by other kids. The show follows the adventures of a team of real monster trainers as...

episodes.title: Hyôryû? Bôken no Shima!
episodes.plot: While at summer camp, seven kids, Tai, Matt, Sora, Izzy, Mimi, Joe, and T.K., come across seven Digivices and are transported to a strange "Digital World". In this new world they make friends with little creatures that call themselves "Digimon"-short for Digital Monsters-who claim to be the children's chosen partners. The seven "Digimon" prove to the kids that they are who they say they are when they digivolve-get much bigger, evolving into a different Digital Monster-and fight as a team to defeat a large, red beetle-like Digimon named Kuwagamon.

episodes.title: Bakuretsu Shinka! Gureimon
episodes.plot: After being chased away by Kuwagamon, the digi-destined arrive at a beach where none of the phones work. Then Shelldramon arrives, and the Digimon are too weak to help. Can the kids or any of the digimon find a way to defeat him?

episodes.title: Aoki Ôkami! Garurumon
episodes.plot: The Kids still doesn't know where they are,but they are very tired. They find some Shelter in an abandoned Trainwagon. But in the middle of the Night they get attacked and now it's up to Gabumon to save them all....

episodes.title: Shakunetsu! Bâdoramon
episodes.plot: The kids come to a Yokomon village to rest for the evening. A Meramon attacks the village and Biyomon digivolves to Birdramon to defeat him, causing a Black Gear to be expelled from his body.

episodes.title: Denkô! Kabuterimon
episodes.plot: The kids stumble upon a strange factory where they find an Andromon caught in the machinery. After they release him he attacks them. Izzy discovers strange coding, which he uses to digivolve Tentomon into Kabuterimon. Kabuterimon destroys the Black Gear controlling Andromon. Apologizing for his behavior, Andromon shows the children out of the factory.

episodes.title: Parumon ikari no shinka
episodes.plot: While escaping the Numemon who attacked the group in the sewers on their way out of the factory, the kids are split up and Mimi ends up in Toy Town after being attacked by a Monzaemon. There she finds the other kids acting strangely. Palmon manages to digivolve into Togemon and destroys the Black Gear that was controlling Monzaemon.

episodes.title: Hôkô! Ikkakumon
episodes.plot: Tai and Matt argue whether they should climb Infinity Mountain. Joe and Gomamon decide to climb the mountain by themselves. While on the mountain, they are attacked by a Unimon. Tai and Sora come to the rescue, and Gomamon digivolves into Ikkakumon and destroys the Black Gear that was controlling Unimon.

episodes.title: Yami no Shisha Debimon
episodes.plot: The kids meet the ruler of File Island, Devimon, the controller of the Black Gears. He, along with Ogremon and a possessed Leomon, attack the kids who manage to escape. They end up in a mysterious mansion, which proves to be a hallucination created by Devimon. Devimon breaks File Island into multiple, smaller islands and separates the kids onto the different islands.

episodes.title: Gekitotsu! Reitô Dejimon
episodes.plot: Tai and Agumon land on a snow-covered island and are forced to defeat a Frigimon. After destroying the Black Gear that was controlling him, they cross over to the island where Matt and Gabumon landed. Meanwhile, Matt goes out to search for his brother against Gabumon's advice and gets hypothermia. Once the two boys meet up, they end up fighting each other until a Mojyamon attacks them. They defeat the Mojyamon and expel the Black Gear that was controlling him.

episodes.title: Shugosha Kentarumon
episodes.plot: Mimi and Palmon are harassed by Sukamon and Chuumon. After escaping them, they cross over to the next island, where Izzy and Tentomon landed. After they reunite, Mimi and Tentomon get lost in a labyrinth and are attacked by Centarumon. Izzy and Palmon finally find them and their Digimon battle and destroy Centarumon's Black Gear. After the battle, Leomon appears and attacks the children, but is driven back by the light of their Digivices.

episodes.title: Odoru bôrei! Bakemon
episodes.plot: After suffering an attack from Ogremon at sea, Joe and Gomamon find themselves on an island with Sora and Biyomon. They are captured by a band of Bakemon intent on eating them. Gomamon and Biyomon manage to escape and digivolve to fight the Lord Bakemon. They eventually defeat him with help from Joe's repetitive chanting.

episodes.title: Bôken! Patamon to boku
episodes.plot: T.K. and Patamon end up in Primary Village, the place where all Digimon are born. There they are confronted by Elecmon, the guardian of the baby Digimon. He struggles with Patamon, having mistaken the two for intruders. To avoid a fight, T.K. proposes that they settle their dispute with a tug-o-war. Patamon wins and earns Elecmon's respect and trust.

episodes.title: Enjemon Kakusei!
episodes.plot: The entire group reunites and is attacked by Leomon. After Leomon is defeated with the light of the Digivices, he tells the children about the prophecies of the "DigiDestined." The group goes back to Infinity Mountain for the final showdown with Devimon. There, Devimon absorbs many Black Gears and grows in size and power-turning the fight in his favor until Patamon digivolves into Angemon and destroys him. Angemon, having used up so much power, reverts into a Digi-egg.

episodes.title: Tabidachi shintairiku e!
episodes.plot: A mysterious person named Gennai appears as a hologram after a fight with Devimon and urges the group to travel to the continent of Server in order to defeat another enemy. Gennai also tells them about objects called Crests that will allow their Digimon to digivolve even further. They build a raft and leave File Island, but are soon swallowed up by Whamon who is still under the control of a Black Gear. After the gear is removed, Whamon takes the kids to where their Tags-the objects that the Crests are stored in-are hidden.

episodes.title: Etemon! Aku no Hanamichi
episodes.plot: The kids arrive in a Koromon village overrun with Pagumon, who trick the kids and kidnap Tokomon. Etemon learns of the arrival of the DigiDestined and confronts them. He uses his Dark Network to prevent the Digimon from digivolving and then traps the group inside a cave where they discover their first Crest, Tai's Crest of Courage.

episodes.title: Ankoku Shinka! SukaruGureimon
episodes.plot: While traveling in the desert, Joe's Tag reacts, leading the group into a Roman-like coliseum. There, they are trapped by Etemon, and Greymon is forced to fight another Greymon. After Joe finds his Crest of Reliability, the group escapes. Tai attempts to force Greymon to digivolve. Greymon digivolves into SkullGreymon and loses control of himself-attacking the others who are unable to stop him. SkullGreymon eventually reverts back to Koromon and apologizes for his behavior.

episodes.title: Maboroshi Senchô Kokatorimon!
episodes.plot: After getting lost in the desert, the group is taken aboard a ship helmed by Kokatorimon. Kokatorimon captures all the boys and their partners. Biyomon and Palmon digivolve and defeat him when his ship crashes into a giant cactus. The top of cactus then opens up to reveal Mimi's Crest of Sincerity.

episodes.title: Yôsei! Pikkoromon
episodes.plot: The group is attacked by a Kuwagamon and Tai fails to digivolve Agumon. Piximon intervenes and saves them. He then offers the group training at his facility, and leads Agumon and Tai into a cave while the others stay outside. When Matt finds his Crest of Friendship and Izzy finds his Crest of Knowledge, they are spotted and attacked by Tyrannomon. Tai and Agumon reappear just in time to defeat Tyrannomon.

episodes.title: Meikyû no Nanomon
episodes.plot: When Takeru's crest is found, an e-mail comes to Koushirou claiming he can help them if they will free him. Should they trust this unknown source?

episodes.title: Kanzentai Shinka! MetaruGureimon
episodes.plot: Taichi and company realize that Sora and Nanomon never left the pyramid, so they figure out where Nanomon is at. Taichi, Koushirou, Agumon, and Tentomon plan a rescue mission, but they'll have to go through an electric wall to succeed. Can Taichi master the courage and show he deserves the Crest of Courage?

episodes.title: Kiken na Yûgi! Pinokkimon
episodes.plot: WarGreymon isn't doing so well and is about to be destroyed. Just in time, Whamon jumps out of the water and takes the blast ment for WarGreymon. Whamon destroys MetalSeadramon using his own "River of Power." Whamon is destroyed. It isn't long after that Puppetmon comes up with an evil plan to destroy the kids. He makes dolls of each of the kids and uses these to make them do what he wants them to. He then separates Matt and T.K. from everyone else. Kiwimon attacks the other kids while Puppetmon corners T.K. T.K. realizes what the dolls are used for and tricks ...
